text: @realDonaldTrump I strongly believe in case a Democrat at the House or Senate gets affected by Covid-19, the House Speaker would definitely launch a new impeachment with hearings of witnesses affirming seeing Donald Trump having thrown some coronavirus on some desks at the House.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
